plot: After being orphaned by the Korean War, a young girl has no choice but to raise her younger siblings. All hopes of future happiness seem dashed when one of her brothers is killed in a traffic accident.
title: Nae maeumui norae
plot_es: After being orphaned by the Korean War, a young girl has no choice but to raise her younger siblings. All hopes of future happiness seem dashed when one of her brothers is killed in a traffic accident.
plot_en: After being orphaned by the Korean War, a young girl has no choice but to raise her younger siblings. All hopes of future happiness seem dashed when one of her brothers is killed in a traffic accident.
